purpose: The email announces a full-time Post-Doc position at the Johannes Kepler University Linz Institute of Technology, focusing on software engineering research in collaboration with Dynatrace. The position is for a duration of up to three years and involves conducting research in areas such as distributed software systems, cloud computing, and real-time data processing. The successful candidate will be expected to apply for research grants, publish findings, and collaborate with other researchers and students. Qualifications include a Ph.D. in Computer Science or a related field, experience in relevant research areas, and proficiency in English. Interested candidates are encouraged to apply by August 10.
